prefix.name: FeedAlreadyExistsException
prefix.value: A feed with the same name already exists.

prefix.name: EmptyFeedNameException
prefix.value: Name of a feed cannot be empty.

prefix.name: EmptyDescriptionException
prefix.value: Description of a feed cannot be empty.

prefix.name: InvalidResourceNameException
prefix.value: Feed name contains unsupported characters - use only letters and numbers.

prefix.name: EmptyUrlException
prefix.value: The feed URL cannot be empty.

prefix.name: EntityInUseException
prefix.value: The feed is used by other resource and cannot be deleted.

prefix.name: error_refreshing_feed
prefix.value: An error occured while refreshing the feed.

prefix.name: exception
prefix.value: Contact system administrator to submit the problem.
